name: Calculator
desc: A calculator is a device that performs mathematical calculations, such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division

name: Netflix
desc: A Netflix clone project is a website or application that mimics the Netflix streaming service, allowing users to watch movies and TV shows.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
desc: A game in which two players by turns put crosses and zeros in compartments of a figure formed by two vertical lines crossing two horizontal lines and each tries to get a row of three crosses or three zeros before the opponent does.

name: Temparature
desc: A temperature converter is a tool that changes a temperature measurement from one unit to another, such as from Celsius to Fahrenheit, or vice versa. The most common temperature units used for conversion are Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

name: ToDo List
desc: A to-do list is a list of tasks that you want to complete or need to do, organized by priority. To-do lists can be written on paper, or created digitally in spreadsheets, word documents, or apps.

name: Age Calculator
desc: The Age Calculator can determine the age or interval between two dates. The calculated age will be displayed in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds.

name: Color Switcher
desc: Color Switch: A mobile game where you navigate through obstacles by matching your character's color to the color of the obstacles. It has over 1,000 levels, multiple game modes, and regular updates. The game is easy to learn but requires skill and strategy to master.

name: Password Genarator
desc: A password generator is a tool that creates random passwords for online accounts.
